dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3626 IH: To extend the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Coble (for himself and Mr. Israel) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To extend the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years.

section.header: Extension of Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years
section.text: Section 2(f)(2) of the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 (18 U.S.C. 922 note) is amended by striking 25 and inserting 35.
